text: Liang Fen is a Chinese female Paralympic sitting volleyball player. She is part of the China women's national sitting volleyball team. She competed at the 2008 Summer Paralympics winning the gold medal. == See also == * China at the 2008 Summer Paralympics == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Volleyball players at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic competitors for China Category:Chinese women's volleyball players Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Chinese sitting volleyball players Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in volleyball Category:Paralympic gold medalists for China
title: Liang Fen
